languages.text: {n}Когда Ничто уже готово забрать вас, заботливые руки вытягивают вас из пустоты небытия.{/n} "Домин'{name}, я вижу: смерть коснулась тебя. Как все прошло?"
{n}Just as Nothing is about to claim you, you are gently lifted from the emptiness of oblivion.{/n} "Domin'{name}, you have been touched by death. What was it like?"
languages.original_text: {n}Когда Ничто уже готово забрать вас, заботливые руки вытягивают вас из пустоты небытия.{/n} "Домин'{name}, я вижу: смерть коснулась тебя. Как все прошло?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Right when Nothing is about to claim you, someone's heedful hands lift you out of the emptiness of oblivion.{/n} "Enim'{name}, I see it: death has touched you. What was it like?"
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Right when Nothing is about to claim you, someone's heedful hands lift you out of the emptiness of oblivion.{/n} "Enim'{name}, I see it: death has touched you. What was it like?"
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Just as Nothing is about to claim you, you are gently lifted from the emptiness of oblivion.{/n} "Domin'{name}, you have been touched by death. What was it like?"
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: {n}Juste au moment où le néant s'apprête à vous emporter, on vous éloigne délicatement de son étreinte.{/n} « Domin'{name}, la mort vous a {mf|touché|touchée}. Qu'avez-vous ressenti ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Just as Nothing is about to claim you, you are gently lifted from the emptiness of oblivion.{/n} "Domin'{name}, you have been touched by death. What was it like?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Juste au moment où le néant s'apprête à vous emporter, on vous éloigne délicatement de son étreinte.{/n} « Domin'{name}, la mort vous a {mf|touché|touchée}. Qu'avez-vous ressenti ? »
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: {n}Justo cuando la Nada está a punto de consumirte, una mano te eleva con gentileza del vacío del olvido.{/n} «Domin'{name}, ha sentido el toque de la muerte. ¿Cómo ha sido?».
languages.original_text: {n}Just as Nothing is about to claim you, you are gently lifted from the emptiness of oblivion.{/n} "Domin'{name}, you have been touched by death. What was it like?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Justo cuando la Nada está a punto de consumirte, una mano te eleva con gentileza del vacío del olvido.{/n} «Domin'{name}, ha sentido el toque de la muerte. ¿Cómo ha sido?».
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: {n}正当你即将被虚无吞噬时，某个人温柔地触碰着你，将你从湮灭的边缘拖了回来。{/n}“秘者{name}，你得到了死亡的触碰。它是什么样子？”
languages.original_text: {n}Just as Nothing is about to claim you, you are gently lifted from the emptiness of oblivion.{/n} "Domin'{name}, you have been touched by death. What was it like?"

traits.locale_text: {n}正当你即将被虚无吞噬时，某个人温柔地触碰着你，将你从湮灭的边缘拖了回来。{/n}“秘者{name}，你得到了死亡的触碰。它是什么样子？”
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: {n}無に飲み込まれそうになった瞬間、あなたは忘却の空虚からそっと引き上げられた。{/n}「ドミン・{name}、あなたは死に触れました。どうでしたか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Just as Nothing is about to claim you, you are gently lifted from the emptiness of oblivion.{/n} "Domin'{name}, you have been touched by death. What was it like?"

traits.locale_text: {n}無に飲み込まれそうになった瞬間、あなたは忘却の空虚からそっと引き上げられた。{/n}「エニム{name}、あなたは死に触れました。どうでしたか？」
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: {n}Gerade, als das Nichts dich verschlingen will, wirst du sanft aus der Leere des Vergessens gehoben.{/n} "Domin'{name}, Ihr wurdet vom Tod berührt. Wie war es?"
languages.original_text: {n}Just as Nothing is about to claim you, you are gently lifted from the emptiness of oblivion.{/n} "Domin'{name}, you have been touched by death. What was it like?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Gerade, als das Nichts dich verschlingen will, wirst du sanft aus der Leere des Vergessens gehoben.{/n} "Domin'{name}, Ihr wurdet vom Tod berührt. Wie war es?"
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: {n}Hiçbir Şey seni almak üzereyken sonsuzluğun boşluğundan nazikçe çekiliyorsun.{/n} "Domin'{name}, ölüm tarafından dokunuldun. Nasıldı?"
languages.original_text: {n}Just as Nothing is about to claim you, you are gently lifted from the emptiness of oblivion.{/n} "Domin'{name}, you have been touched by death. What was it like?"
